    pfs="Standard"
>
[Waterproof Carrying Case](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1208)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 179 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 2 sp

<row gap="medium">

**Hands** 2

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This buttoned, leather case protects a firearm and up to 6 rounds of ammunition from being damaged by water or other environmental effects.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Waterproof Carrying Case
